what-if.title: What-If Scenarios
what-if.description: See how different market returns would affect your final capital.

table.scenarioHint: Different return rate scenarios compared to your selected fund
table.finalCapitalHint: The amount you would accumulate under this scenario
table.differenceHint: How much more or less you would have compared to the base scenario
table.percentChangeHint: Percentage change compared to the base scenario

scenarios.pessimistic-3: Severe market downturn: what if your investments return 3% less annually than expected?
scenarios.pessimistic-2: Market underperformance: what if returns are 2% lower than the fund's historical average?
scenarios.pessimistic-1: Slight underperformance: a small 1% decrease in annual returns
scenarios.optimistic-1: Slight outperformance: a small 1% increase in annual returns
scenarios.optimistic-2: Market outperformance: what if returns are 2% higher than expected?
scenarios.optimistic-3: Strong bull market: what if your investments return 3% more annually?

type.age-basedHint: Set a fixed monthly contribution and see how much capital you'll accumulate by your goal age
type.goal-basedHint: Set a target amount and the calculator will determine the required monthly contribution

fields.name: Strategy Name
fields.currentAgeHint: Your current age to start calculating from
fields.goalAgeHint: The age by which you want to reach your financial goal or stop investing
fields.goalHint: The target amount you want to accumulate by your goal age
fields.initialAmountHint: The lump sum you can invest right now to start growing
fields.monthlyContributionHint: The amount you plan to invest every month consistently
fields.selectedFundHint: The investment fund determines your expected yearly return rate
fields.inflationRateHint: Expected annual inflation rate to calculate real purchasing power of your future money
fields.taxRateHint: Tax rate applied to investment gains (capital gains tax)

goalBasedSummary.title: Required Monthly Contribution
goalBasedSummary.description: Calculated monthly amount needed to reach your goal by the target age with selected fund.
goalBasedSummary.placeholder: Fill in goal, age, and financial fields to calculate

summary.title: Final Summary
summary.finalCapitalHint: The total amount you will have at your goal age, including all contributions and investment returns minus taxes
summary.totalContributionsHint: The sum of your initial investment plus all monthly contributions over the investment period
summary.totalReturnsHint: Total profit earned from your investments before taxes
summary.totalTaxesHint: Total amount paid in taxes on investment gains over the entire period
summary.inflationAdjustedCapitalHint: What your final capital will be worth in today's money, accounting for inflation
summary.inflationAdjustedCapitalDescription: In today's prices adjusted for {{rate}}% inflation
summary.yearsToGoalHint: Number of years from now until you reach your goal age
summary.averageYearlyReturnHint: The nominal annual return rate of your selected investment fund before inflation
summary.effectiveReturnHint: Real return rate after subtracting inflation — shows actual growth in purchasing power

columns.capitalStartHint: The amount of capital at the beginning of the year
columns.contributionsHint: Total monthly contributions added during the year (12 months × monthly contribution)
columns.returnHint: Investment gains earned during the year based on the fund's return rate
columns.taxHint: Taxes paid on investment gains this year
columns.withdrawalHint: Money withdrawn for life events (home purchase, education, etc.)
columns.capitalEndHint: The total amount at the end of the year after all contributions, returns, taxes, and withdrawals
columns.goalProgressHint: Percentage of your target goal achieved so far

delay-cost-info.title: Cost of Delay
delay-cost-info.description: If you start investing every {{stepYears}} years later, you will lose the indicated amount from your final capital.

table.delayYearsHint: Number of years you would delay starting your investments
table.ageAtStartHint: Your age when you would actually start investing
table.yearAtGoalHint: Calendar year when you would reach your goal age
table.delayedCapitalHint: How much capital you would accumulate if you started investing later
table.costHint: Amount of money lost due to delayed start compared to starting now
table.costPercentageHint: Percentage of final capital lost due to the delay
table.requiredInitialDescription: The initial lump sum you would need to invest to catch up and reach the same final capital despite starting later
table.requiredMonthlyDescription: The monthly contribution you would need to make to catch up and reach the same final capital despite starting later

life-events.title: Life Events
life-events.description: Add major expenses (buying a home, wedding, education) to see their impact on capital growth.
